name: Tiny Iowa State Necklace (sterling silver)
description:
Wear your story around your neck.

Part 1: The story

Let me help you tell your story. We all have a story and what better way to share it than by wearing this special piece. Perhaps you've moved and you want a reminder of home, maybe you just can't imagine living anywhere else and you want everyone to know, maybe it's where you first fell in love, or a memorable travel experience. Whatever your story is it's unique and special to you just as this necklace will be.

Part 2: The process

Each piece is hand made by me in my home studio from start to finish. I hand saw each and every piece with as much accuracy as possible. I ensure its perfection as I hammer or sand each one depending on what you prefer. I can then cut out a freehand heart on your tiny pendant if you would like, making it even more unique. Finally I smooth out the edges, buff it, and package it in a special gift box.

Part 3: The details (what you'll get)

-A sterling silver tiny Iowa pendant that measures 3/8" by 1/4" hung on a sterling silver chain
-A choice of a shiny (hammered) or matte (sanded) finish
-A choice of a tiny heart cut freehand as long as there is room for it-(please mention in the notes to seller or message me directly if you would like one, otherwise no heart will be included)
-Comes with either a 16", 18", or 20" chain
-Your piece will be beautifully gift wrapped to be cherished or gifted (includes cleaning intructions)
-Each one is made to order and just for you!

I am here to answer any questions or concerns you may have before and after your purchase. Feel free to contact me.

name: The Ultimate United States Necklace Collection
description:
The Ultimate United States Necklace Collection.

Wear your story around your neck.

Part 1: The story

We all have a unique story to tell and maybe your story can’t be defined to just one state. Perhaps your story is spread out among all 50 states. Maybe you’ve been lucky enough to travel across America or perhaps you’re working toward that goal. With the Ultimate United States collection your memories of each state will always be close to you. Be the first ever to own this one-of-a-kind collection. You’ll be among a select few who can say they own all of the OhSoAntsy state necklaces.

Part 2: The process

Each piece is hand made by me in my home studio from start to finish. I hand saw each and every piece with as much accuracy as possible. I ensure their perfection as I hammer them with care. I then locate, as closely as possible, your chosen heart location and I freehand every one so they are all unique. I then smooth out the edges, polish them up, and package them in extra special wrapping.

Part 3: The details (what you'll get)

-All 50 sterling silver United States pendants.
-4 chains in total-1 each of a 16”, 18”, 20”, and 22” sterling silver box chain.
-One custom placed heart over the city of your choice on each pendant-(you may also elect to have the heart placed over each capital city or to have no heart included).
-Your collection will be uniquely and beautifully gift wrapped to be cherished or gifted.
-Each collection is made to order and just for you (please allow 2 weeks for completion)!
-Your extra special collection will be shipped priority mail with tracking and insurance.

I am here to answer any questions or concerns you may have before and after your purchase. Feel free to contact me.

Each pendant can be hung on it's own chain if you wish for an additional charge.
